title: Rek Sai Bug?
body:
I'm not really sure where to put this since I'm not entirely sure if it should be considered a "bug" or not but "Report A Bug" was the closest match.

As  brand new Rek-Sai player I found myself trying to burrow and E quickly, but then noticing that E was on CD.....why?
Then I noticed something. Rek-sai's E ability when burrowed (i.e. her Tunnel) apparently has its own separate CD then her E when unburrowed (her Furious Bite). This mean that if I Burrow, Tunnel, AA to Unburrow, then want to escape, I'll glance down and notice that my E is off CD, hit W to Burrow, but now that  I'm burrowed my E is not Furious Bite anymore, but Tunnel...which is still on CD....which means I can't use it.

I don't think that other champs that have changing abilities (Nidalee, Jayce, Shyvana) have this problem (but I haven't been able to test this out), as far as I know they are considered the same spells so if Jayce uses his E in hammer stance and then instantly goes to ranged stance his E will still be on CD am I wrong?

replies.body: Jayce, Elise, Nidalee and Rek'Sai have separate cooldowns for each form. Gnar and Shyvana share cooldowns between forms.
And Quinn and Valor ~~don't~~ share them _too_ ~~either~~. You forgot about them
Yes they do. If you use E as Valor to dive in, you can't switch to Quinn and E again to escape.

Would it be possible to display this fact on the hud? I think it is unfair that I could have abilities on CD, especially ones vital to my kit (like Rek Sai's E) and yet never really know for sure if its off cooldown without just burrowing to find out
I say shes more like a lizard.
Shyvana doesn't get new skills. Dragon form just makes them AOE.
